docs.snippet: Platform writers in both parties call for reviving Glass-Steagall to curb Wall Street. But the agreement is narrow and shallow....
docs.lead_paragraph: Platform writers in both parties call for reviving Glass-Steagall to curb Wall Street. But the agreement is narrow and shallow.
docs.abstract: Strategies column; Democratic and Republican parties are both embracing populist rhetoric about reining in big banks; planks in both party platforms call for restoration of Glass-Steagall Act, which separated commercial and investment banking.

headline.main: G.O.P. Joins Democrats Urging Glass-Steagall’s Revival. (Don’t Hold Your Breath.)
headline.print_headline: Both Political Parties Agree: Rein In the Big Banks

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)

docs.snippet: Delegates at the Republican National Convention thunderously booed Ted Cruz for refusing to endorse Donald Trump Wednesday — clouding an evening intended to highlight vice presidential candidate Mike Pence as a unifying force for the party. ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Delegates at the Republican National Convention thunderously booed Ted Cruz for refusing to endorse Donald Trump Wednesday — clouding an evening intended to highlight vice presidential candidate Mike Pence as a unifying force for the party. The disorder provided fresh reminders of the fissures that remain.

headline.main: Delegates Boo Cruz, Pence Tries to Unite at Convention
headline.print_headline: Delegates Boo Cruz, Pence Tries to Unite at Convention

docs.snippet: United States Vice President Joe Biden on Wednesday assured key ally Australia there would be no retreat from Washington's pivot to the Asia-Pacific region regardless of who wins November's presidential election....
docs.lead_paragraph: United States Vice President Joe Biden on Wednesday assured key ally Australia there would be no retreat from Washington's pivot to the Asia-Pacific region regardless of who wins November's presidential election.

headline.main: No Retreat From Asia Pivot Regardless of Who Wins U.S. Presidency: Biden
headline.print_headline: No Retreat From Asia Pivot Regardless of Who Wins U.S. Presidency: Biden

docs.snippet: U.S. Senator Ted Cruz refused to endorse Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump at the party's convention on Wednesday, sparking an eruption of angry jeers from Trump supporters and shattering the facade of party unity that has been carefull...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Senator Ted Cruz refused to endorse Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump at the party's convention on Wednesday, sparking an eruption of angry jeers from Trump supporters and shattering the facade of party unity that has been carefully built up in Cleveland this week.

headline.main: Ted Cruz Jeered, Wife Escorted Out at Raucous Republican Convention
headline.print_headline: Ted Cruz Jeered, Wife Escorted Out at Raucous Republican Convention

docs.snippet: Tom Vilsack's political story already reads like a modern Horatio Alger tale: a humble beginning at an orphanage in Pittsburgh, a rise to governor of Iowa and then to the nation's secretary of agriculture....

headline.main: Tom Vilsack: A Rise From Orphanage to Cabinet Secretary

docs.snippet: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump has called climate change a hoax and has vowed not to let regulation stand in the way of expanded U.S. oil drilling if elected. But a group of his supporters at the Republican National Convention in C...
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump has called climate change a hoax and has vowed not to let regulation stand in the way of expanded U.S. oil drilling if elected. But a group of his supporters at the Republican National Convention in Cleveland this week are lobbying him to soften that stance.

headline.main: Green Republicans Resist Trump's Climate Denial in Cleveland
headline.print_headline: Green Republicans Resist Trump's Climate Denial in Cleveland

docs.snippet: China's Foreign Ministry on Thursday urged the U.S. Republican Party to stop making "groundless accusations" against China in its party platform, which says China practices cultural genocide in Tibet and has ludicrous claims in the South China Sea...
docs.lead_paragraph: China's Foreign Ministry on Thursday urged the U.S. Republican Party to stop making "groundless accusations" against China in its party platform, which says China practices cultural genocide in Tibet and has ludicrous claims in the South China Sea.

headline.main: China Upset by U.S. Republican Platform on South China Sea, Tibet
headline.print_headline: China Upset by U.S. Republican Platform on South China Sea, Tibet

docs.snippet: In a story July 20 about the NAACP convention in Cincinnati, The Associated Press incorrectly referred to the group's president in several instances. He is Cornell William Brooks....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story July 20 about the NAACP convention in Cincinnati, The Associated Press incorrectly referred to the group's president in several instances. He is Cornell William Brooks.
